name: gastown-boy
description: Pip-Boy style UI for Gas Town multi-agent workspace

scripts.dev: npm run kill && npx concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: export GT_TOWN_ROOT=${GT_TOWN_ROOT:-/Users/will/gt} && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npx concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
